msg: Addressed the closing of the stream to happen in the run() function for the class.
Performed some minor changes to the function interfaces to use the Charset class instead of String.

author: jameskosin
msg: a)  Refactored to use only "en" as language.  The US Census data is expected to be in English.
b)  Created a function createDictionary() ... currently in the tool; but, to be moved later.
c)  Added comments on the format of the data files.  This is the same information from the Census web-site.
